assume cs:codesg, ds:datasg
datasg segment
    welcome db 'Arithmetic system of primary school$'
    file db '1. add$'
    insert db '2. subtract$'
    modify db '3. multiply$'
    exit db '4. devide$'
datasg ends
  
codesg segment
start:

    mov ax, datasg
    mov ds, ax
        
    mov ah, 02h 
    mov dh, 09h 
    mov dl, 13h 
    int 10h 
        
    lea dx, welcome
    mov ah, 09h
    int 21h

    lea dx, exit

    int 21h

codesg ends
end start
